PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 which are designed to ensure that certain tax-sheltered benefits comply with provisions in the Income Tax Act for Registered Pension Plans.

precis:
Regulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS,
NO. 1 which are designed to ensure that certain tax-sheltered benefits
comply with provisions in the Income Tax Act for Registered Pension Plans.
